item.title: CO-14 West/CO-71 North at CO-71 North
item.description: CO-14 West/CO-71 North at CO-71 North. Turn right on CO-71 north for Kimball (Nebraska). Continue west on CO-14 for Ault.

item.title: CO-14 West - Pawnee National Grasslands
item.description: Entering Pawnee National Grasslands on CO-14 West.

item.title: CO-14 West - Weld County
item.description: Entering Weld County on CO-14 west.

item.title: CO-14 West/CO-71 North at CO-14/CO-71 Split
item.description: CO-14 West/CO-71 North at CO-14/CO-71 Split in Weld County. Turn right to continue north on CO-71.

item.title: CO-14 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CO-14 west. Distance to Stoneham and New Raymer.

item.title: CO-14 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CO-14 west. Distance to Ault and Fort Collins.

item.title: BL-76/US-6 East at CO-14
item.description: BL-76/US-6 East at CO-14 in Sterling. Turn left for CO-14 West; right for BL-76/US-6/CO-14 East To US-138/To I-76.

item.title: BL-76/US-6/CO-14 West at BL-76/US-6 and CO-14 Split
item.description: BL-76/US-6/CO-14 West at BL-76/US-6 and CO-14 Split in Sterling.

item.title: BL-76/US-6/CO-14 West Approaching BL-76/US-6 and CO-14 Split
item.description: BL-76/US-6/CO-14 West Approaching BL-76/US-6 and CO-14 Split in Sterling. Continue on CO-14 West to Fort Collins; BL-76/US-6 West to Atwood.

item.title: BL-76/US-6 West at CO-14 and US-138
item.description: BL-76/US-6 West at CO-14 and US-138 in Sterling. Turn right for US-138 East to Julesburg. Continue straight for BL-76/US-6/CO-14 East to Brush. Both CO-14 and US-138 begin at this intersection.

item.title: BL-76/US-6 West - To US-138/CO-14
item.description: BL-76/US-6 West - To US-138/CO-14 in Sterling.

item.title: BL-76/US-6 West - Sterling
item.description: (BL-76)/US-6 West/To US-138/To CO-14 in Sterling

item.title: CO-14 West/CO-71 North at CO-71 North
item.description: CO-14 West/CO-71 North at CO-71 North. Turn right on CO-71 north for Kimball (Nebraska). Continue west on CO-14 for Ault.

item.title: CO-71 North at CO-14
item.description: CO-71 north at CO-14. Use CO-14 east for Sterling; CO-14 west/CO-71 north for Stoneham and Ault. CO-71 north joins CO-14 to Stoneham.

item.title: US-287 North at CO-14 West
item.description: US-287 north at CO-14 west.

item.title: US-287 North Approaching CO-14 West
item.description: US-287 north approaching CO-14 west to Walden.

item.title: US-287 North at Laporte Jct.
item.description: US-287 approaching Laporte junction. Continue straight for Laporte. Turn right for US-287/To CO-14 to Laramie and Poudre Canyon.

item.title: US-287 North/To CO-14 West
item.description: US-287 North/To CO-14 west north of Fort Collins.

item.title: CO-14 West at US-287
item.description: CO-14 west at US-287 in Fort Collins. Use US-287 north for Laramie (WY) and Laporte, and US-287 south for Loveland.

item.title: CO-14 West/To US-287 North
item.description: CO-14 west to US-287 at the corner of E. Mulberry St. and Riverside Ave.

item.title: End CO-52 North at CO-14 To CO-71
item.description: CO-52 north at CO-14 west to New Raymer, CO-14 East/To CO-71 east to Sterling.

item.title: CO-14 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CO-14 west to CO-52 and Ault, west of CO-71 north junction.

item.title: CO-71 South at CO-14
item.description: CO-71 south at CO-14. CO-14 west to Ault and Fort Collins; CO-14 East/CO-71 South to Sterling and Brush.

item.title: US-40 East at CO-14 East
item.description: US-40 east at CO-14 east on Muddy Pass.

item.title: US-40 East Approaching CO-14 North
item.description: US-40 east approaching CO-14 north to Walden at Muddy Pass.
